DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_0
You check your mailbox. There are no new messages.

DLG SPR_1
A news report is on, a fire is raging in Elegant City.

DLG SPR_2
A news report is on, a fire is raging in Elegant City.

DLG SPR_3
You check under your bed.. there is nothing there.

DLG SPR_4
You lay down to take a nap...

DLG SPR_5
Your Replicant Entertainment System has been broken for a few months now...

DLG SPR_6
Just some leftovers in the fridge..

DLG SPR_7
Just some leftovers in the fridge..

DLG SPR_8
A classic rock song is playing.

DLG SPR_9
You know better than to go in your mother's room.

DLG SPR_a
"""
{sequence
  - Mom: "Have you seen the news? It's terrible!
  - "Oh, and Kyle wanted to see you."
}
"""

VAR a
42
